divs: Sighting DetailsI just read a post on MUFON labeled "2009-01-26 2009-01-25 Hovering, star with blinking lights" and I wanted to say - YES - I have seen this same object and so has my fiance. We live in Hatfield, PA. One night we observed it for at least a half hour or more. It was not there the next night so it's not a star. It barely moves so it's not a plane. It looks like a bright star but when looked at closely, it looks like it has multi-colored lights flickering as if you are watching a glowing crystal. The exact date and time - I do not remember
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 2 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 1st 2008
